Name: ClimateCart: Carbon free order
Description:
Sustainability made simple. Cool the planet by offering your customers a carbon neutral checkout.  With ClimateCart you can empower your customers to take climate action in a fun and easy way. A small widget is added to your shopping cart. Your customers can then choose to make their orders carbon neutral, by funding climate positive projects, that are endorsed by the UN and have a Gold Standard certificate.
You collect the carbon offset donations from your customers, and we collect that exact amount from you at the end of your billing cycle.
